```{r setup}
library(ussie)
library(dplyr)
```

ussie lets you build European football data from the engsoccerdata package by making tidy tibbles for each country.

```{r}
spain = uss_make_matches(engsoccerdata::spain, "Spain")
glimpse(spain)
```
